'''Nobrow''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the end of the [[Age of Discovery]].
document_data.History: The arcanist developed two spells during their life, both involving [[fire]]. The spells they invented were ''[[fire charm]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|3124|NY}} and ''[[affect normal fires]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|3130|NY}}.
